verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Descending <S%G2597><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Key <S%G2807><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Abyss, <S%G12><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Chain <S%G254><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> His Hand. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Laid Hold Of <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dragon, <S%G1404><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Serpent <S%G3789><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Ancient, <S%G744><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is The <S%G2076><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Satan, <S%G4567><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bound <S%G1210><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Years, <S%G2094><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Abyss, <S%G12><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shut <S%G2808><s%> Him Up, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sealed <S%G4972><s%> Over <S%G1883><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> He Should Mislead <S%G4105><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Longer, <S%G2089><s%> Until <S%G891><s%> Were Completed <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Years; <S%G2094><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> After These <S%G3326><s%> Things <S%G5023><s%> <S%G1163><s%> He Must <S%G846><s%> Be Loosed <S%G3089><s%> A Little <S%G3398><s%> Time. <S%G5550><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Thrones; <S%G2362><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Sat <S%G2523><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Souls <S%G5590><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Beheaded <S%G3990><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Testimony <S%G3141><s%> Of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Do Homage To <S%G4352><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Beast, <S%G2342><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1504><s%> His Image, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Receive <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mark <S%G5480><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3359><s%> Their Forehead, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> , Their Hand <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Lived <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Reigned <S%G936><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Years : <S%G2094><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Lived Again <S%G326><s%> Till <S%G2193><s%> May Have Completed <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Years. <S%G2094><s%> This Is <S%G3778><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First. <S%G4413><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Part <S%G3313><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First : <S%G4413><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> These <S%G5130><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Has No <S%G2192><s%> Authority; <S%G1849><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> They Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Priests <S%G2409><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Reign <S%G936><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Years. <S%G2094><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> May Have Been Completed <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Years, <S%G2094><s%> Will Be Loosed <S%G3089><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Prison <S%G5438><s%> His, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Will Go Out <S%G1831><s%> To Mislead <S%G4105><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Corners <S%G1137><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Gog <S%G1136><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Magog, <S%G3098><s%> To Gather Together <S%G4863><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> War, <S%G4171><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Number Is <S%G706><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sand <S%G285><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Went Up <S%G305><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Breadth <S%G4114><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Encircled <S%G2944><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Camp <S%G3925><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Beloved : <S%G25><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came Down <S%G2597><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Devoured <S%G2719><s%> Them : <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Misleads <S%G4105><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Was Cast <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lake <S%G3041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Fire <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Brimstone, <S%G2303><s%> Where Are <S%G3699><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> False Prophet; <S%G5578><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Shall Be Tormented <S%G928><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> A Throne <S%G2362><s%> White <S%G3022><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> , It, <S%G846><s%> Whose <S%G3739><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Fled <S%G5343><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Found <S%G2147><s%> For Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> Small <S%G3398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Books <S%G975><s%> Were Opened; <S%G455><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Book <S%G975><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> , Was Opened, <S%G455><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is That <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life. <S%G2222><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Judged <S%G2919><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Books <S%G975><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Their Works. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Gave Up <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> Gave Up <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Dead; <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Judged <S%G2919><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Their Works : <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Was Not Found <S%G2147><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Book <S%G976><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> Written, <S%G1125><s%> He Was Cast <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lake <S%G3041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Fire. <S%G4442><s%>
